issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h4. Steps to reproduce
1. Create a default project
2. build the project
3. change the DefaultIcon.png to some other image (while retaining the name)
4. build the project

h4. Expected result
The app should be using the changed DefaultIcon.png

h4. Actual result
The app is using the old DefaultIcon.png
fields.summary: iOS: Changing DefaultIcon.png has no effect in subsequent builds

comments.body:
Verified as fixed, changing DefaultIcon.png now reflects in subsequent builds. Successful for both Classic & Alloy projects. Tested on:

iOS 9, iPhone 6S
OSX El Capitan 10.11
Studio: 4.3.1.201509302304
Ti SDK: 5.1.0.v20151007122834
Appc NPM: 4.2.0
Appc CLI: 5.0.2
